data_source_validation.notes: All API calls successful, all data from DataForSEO API responses

search_intent.content_strategy: Commercial-informational hybrid: Breed education (informational base) + commercial elements (buying guidance, pricing, breeder information)

must_have_topics.evidence: Knowledge graph + all top 10 results include breed definition in title/description
10 of 10 results mention Lipica/Slovenia, Habsburg origins, 1580 founding
Knowledge graph explicitly lists colors; 9 of 10 mention grey-gen/schimmel genetics
All top 10 emphasize intelligence, sensibility, learning ability
Piber, Lipica, Monterotondo mentioned in 8 results
PAA question 'Wie viel Euro kostet ein Lipizzaner?' + 8 results reference 5,000-25,000 EUR range
9 of 10 results emphasize famous use in classical riding school
PAA question found; wehorse & fressnapf explicitly address beginner unsuitability

differentiation_opportunities.topic: Farbveränderung bei Geburt (Color Change at Birth)
differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Deep dive on grey-gen genetics with visual timeline (born black → age 6-10 turns white)
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: PAA question directly asks this; competitors mention briefly but don't explain genetics in detail

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Detailed Operation Cowboy narrative + breeding line preservation strategy
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: Wikipedia mentions; most commercial sites skip WWII history entirely

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Neapolitano Nima I case study (40 years old record); breed longevity science
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: Competitors mention 25-30 years average but miss record-holder + health factors

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Karst origins → low-feed diet requirements; Piber summer mountain training methods
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: Only wehorse & fressnapf mention; opportunity for PferdeWert's practical guidance angle

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Detailed brand marking guide per Gestüt + 17 stud families explanation
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: Wikipedia has extensive detail; commercial sites skip this entirely (breeder education gap)

completely_missing.source: PAA question present but no competitor answers comprehensively
completely_missing.reason: High PAA volume question; all competitors say 'not suitable' but none explain HOW to adapt for beginners or WHEN they become suitable

completely_missing.source: Not in PAA, but competitive comparison missing entirely
completely_missing.reason: Knowledge graph suggests related searches (Lusitano, Andalusier); opportunity for comparison article

completely_missing.source: Pricing mentioned but no legal/insurance guidance
completely_missing.reason: Commercial intent keyword; buyers need this info

unique_angles: Rich structured data (breed characteristics, origins, colors, size)
rank_1_analysis.key_differentiator: Comprehensive knowledge graph beats individual articles for quick facts

format_recommendations.word_count_source: Parsed from Top 3: Wikipedia (estimated 5000+), wehorse (2800), fressnapf (2400) - avg 2687, target +10%
format_recommendations.word_count_notes: Wikipedia dominates with encyclopedic depth; commercial sites 2400-2800 range optimal

required_sections.keywords: lipizzaner schimmel, farbveränderung, grey-gen, bei geburt schwarz

visual_elements.topic: Farbveränderung: Von schwarz bei Geburt zu weiß (age 6-10)
Züchtungsgeschichte: 1580-heute (Karst origins → Spanish crosses → Operation Cowboy)
Beginner Checklist: Ist ein Lipizzaner für mich geeignet?

format_recommendations.featured_snippet_format: Bullet list with 4-6 items (optimal for Google snippet)

2.strength: Comprehensive breed history, genetics, breeding lines, stamps

3.strength: Modern formatting, beginner guidance, character profile, breeding lines

4.strength: Structured sections, stud profiles, practical care tips

6-10.mix: ehorses (ecommerce), timetravel-vienna (blog), hofreitschule.de (institutional), equusvitalis.de (blog), kroati.de (info), fundis-reitsport.de (blog)

competitor_landscape.assessment: Very high-authority sites dominate (Wikipedia, Google KG, official SRS). Difficult to outrank without exceptional E-E-A-T signals. Strategy: Target long-tail variations + own unique angle (PferdeWert buyer education focus)

eeat_signals.credentials_reasoning: Top 10 emphasize Trainer expertise, breed organizations, veterinary guidance on grey-gen genetics
data_sources: UNESCO 2022 - Lipizzaner breeding traditions intangible heritage
Piber Gestüt - breeding data & selection criteria
eeat_signals.trust_signals_strategy: Combine institutional authority (cite official breed organizations) + veterinary expertise (genetics explanation) + historical credibility (WWII rescue documentation)
